# Guiding Questions {-}

## Motivation and Review {-}

- What do you think the word "cause" means? (It's also useful to think about synonyms like "resulted in" and "led to.") What do you think the phrase "causal effect" means?
- In your experience, how do people use the word "cause" (and its synonyms) in conversation? What assumptions do people make about causes? Why do we want to learn about causes?
- What do you think of the saying "correlation does not imply causation"? When has this saying come up in conversation?
